reviewText:
I love Turma da Monica, they have really good cartoons for kids. I bought it because I wanted my nephew to learn Portuguese and it is a Brazilian cartoon. I think there's an option to watch it in English too, but it was not my intention and I did not even look for it. I watched all the cartoons with my boyfriend before and it was really fun! I definitely recommend it! I think there are 10 mini stories of 10 min each.
I will probably buy the Best Moments of Cebolinha soon.
I miss the Chico Bento television series very much, I'm very happy with this DVD. I do recommend it to anyone.
